public void initializePlayerBoard(java.lang.String playerName,
                                  java.util.Vector<Ship> shipList)
Initializes the board of a given player. Note that the ship list is supposed to be already validated by the servlet.

Parameters:
playerName - Name of the player to set.
shipList - Vector containing the ship list.

startGame

public boolean startGame()
Attempts to start the game. Will be successful if both players are ready.

Returns:
True if the game started successfully, False if it didn't.

Returns:
